examInfo.name: GCP Professional Data Engineer
examInfo.description: Practice exam for Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer certification

questions.question: You need to design a data processing system that handles both batch and real-time data. Which service should you use for real-time ingestion?
questions.explanation: Cloud Pub/Sub is a scalable, real-time messaging service that can be used for ingesting streaming data.

questions.question: Which GCP service is best suited for creating a unified pipeline that handles both stream and batch data?
questions.explanation: Cloud Dataflow supports both stream and batch data processing, making it suitable for unified pipelines.

domains.domain: Building and Operationalizing Data Processing Systems

questions.question: You want to automate and orchestrate a series of GCP data processing tasks. What should you use?
questions.explanation: Cloud Composer is based on Apache Airflow and is used for workflow orchestration.

questions.question: Which GCP service provides a code-free interface for building ETL pipelines?
questions.explanation: Cloud Data Fusion offers a graphical interface for building ETL/ELT pipelines without writing code.

questions.question: You need to deploy a trained TensorFlow model to serve real-time predictions. Which service should you use?
questions.explanation: AI Platform Prediction is designed to host trained models and serve predictions in real time.

questions.question: You want to retrain a model automatically when new data is available. Which service helps you schedule this retraining?
questions.explanation: Vertex AI Pipelines allow you to automate the ML workflow, including retraining when new data is ingested.
